title: BDZ
lyrics: Like a bulldozer Like a tank. Like a soldier. Let's go let's go kowasu yo kimi no kokoro no gādo hito-tsu nokorazuubau yo hāto konna ki mochi wa ha jimete! da i jiken da yo kimi ni de atta totan ni dokidoki tomara nai oh no kodō wa4 bīto su pīdoappu8 bīto tachimachi hayaku naru dokidoki tte dokidoki tte arere? kore wa hajimete tte dō shiyō! ? My love Woo Like a bulldozer Like a tank. Like a soldier. Let's go let's go kowasu yo kimi no kokoro no gādo hito-tsu nokorazuubau yo hāto kimi ga suki yo ...zettai hon mei yo Let's go let's go hachiki re sō na omoi su bete uchia ketai no negaikomete dō yatte tsu taeyō Mail ya te gami ja No No Face to Face mu kiatte kotoba to egao de Al right! ano ne, watashi, daiji na hanashi… ’soko made ieta kedo… dokidoki tte dokidoki tte ya baba! nan mo ienakutte kakugo kimeteWoo Like a bulldozer Like a tank. Like a soldier.
